title: E.U. Takes Aim at Big Tech’s Power With Landmark Digital Act - The New York Times
content:
1. E.U. Takes Aim at Big Tech’s Power With Landmark Digital Act  The New York Times
  2. Europe agrees on big new package of tech rules  Axios
  3. EU targets Big Tech with sweeping new antitrust legislation  The Verge
  4. Analysis: New EU rules regulating U.S. tech giants likely to set global standard  Reuters
  5. Europe says yes to messaging interoperability as it agrees major new regime for big tech  TechCrunch
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Digital Markets Act is the most sweeping legislation to regulate tech since a European privacy law was passed in 2018.
